title: A Champ that Breaks the 4th Wall
body:
Just making a suggestion for a champ that consistently breaks the 4th wall. There's one, maybe two champs who have one current line of speech that breaks the 4th wall, but I'm looking for a champ that Breaks the 4th wall very consistently, not only in Speech, but in moves (possibly).

Anyone up to the idea?

UPDATE [4/17/2015 11:31pm-US-Central]: Yes, one of the characters does infact break the fourth wall. I understand that. But I'm asking for a character that says more than just one line of damage to the wall. We need a character that _consistently_ breaks the fourth wall with **Speech and Abilities**.

replies.body: {{champion:82}}   _"You only need to click once, fool."_
Heard that one already, still looking for a character that breaks **more** of the fourth wall.
Final Bump, unless we get rollin'...

Post Bump

(do people do this 'round here?)

Champion has an ability where they become untargetable for 2.5 seconds, jump up on the HUD and start talking to the player.

All kidding aside, I think its best some things aren't messed with, but its a neat idea :P

> [{quoted}](name=Keagn,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w70JRI8o,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-04-14T22:08:09.964+0000)

> All kidding aside, I think its best some things aren't messed with, but its a neat idea :P

It's a neat idea that doesn't necessarily even have to do what you said. I think the character should be ridiculous, but not in such a way that he could become annoying when you use one of his abilities. I mean, one of his abilities could even be just taking the ability box and smashing it into the opponent. Lol

I mean, one of his abilities could even be just taking the ability box and smashing it into the opponent. Lol

I was just making a joke honestly, but yeah, something of the sort could be done.
{{champion:82}} Laughs at the 4th wall. He reaches deadpool levels with some of his comments, and it's wonderful. Most of his talking is based on breaking it afaik.

> [{quoted}](name=usul1202,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=w70JRI8o,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-14T22:03:46.774+0000)

> {{champion:82}} Laughs at the 4th wall. He reaches deadpool levels with some of his comments, and it's wonderful. Most of his talking is based on breaking it afaik.

I haven't played him yet, and he is one of the champs I'm referring to when I said that "one, maybe two champs who do break the 4th wall", but even then, one of my friends backed me up and says that the quote from him you posted above is his only 4th wall line.
I was sure that he has a /joke that was something about his health bar being above his head, but can't seem to find it anywhere now. Oh well.
For the champions, wouldn't it be the ceiling to them?
